body:
Comment 5: 
I see.  Sorry.  I managed to miss that you were just copying from the blog.

Andrew, the problem is that in http://blog.golang.org/pipelines/bounded.go the call to
ioutil.ReadFile in digester does not indicate where any error is coming from, so when
the error is eventually reported the actual problem is quite obscure.
_Labels changed: added **repo-blog**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
